title: Resting Corwin Caldor
summary: The party fought off skeletons, identified Rennâ€™s grandfather, Corwin Caldor, and successfully returned his intact remains to the watchtower. After burying him, they received payment from Renn before seeking further work.

title: Goblin Raid Resolution
summary: The party defeated the goblin ambush, with Marwen incinerating several foes and Sabriel providing healing. They spared one goblin who fled, then returned to the farmer to receive payment and bonus cheese for the rescued sheep, concluding the job.

title: Tavern Brawl with Imperium Traders
summary: After a late-night bonding session, the party faced escalating tensions with Imperium traders. Bazgar initiated a brawl, knocking out several traders before Thorgrim enforced peace with free beer, allowing the party to rest undisturbed.

title: Confrontation with Giant Spider
summary: The party stealthily approached a web-covered camp, negotiated with a giant spider, and killed a hatching spiderling. After stabilizing a worker, they destroyed the spider eggs, recovered the dead, and prepared to return to Ardenford for payment.

title: Shopping and Research at Merrowgate
summary: The party completed their shopping at various local shops, acquiring items including a discounted Sleep scroll and replacement throwing axes. Marwen stole an uncatalogued holy book during her research at the Concordance Library, successfully evading detection.

title: Consultation with Elarion the Elf
summary: Marwen approached Elarion, the elf librarian, to seek guidance on ruins, dwarf guides, and local shops. With valuable directions and recommendations received, the party concluded their conversation and prepared to continue their errands.
